definitions.definition: An open shed for sheltering cattle , or protecting produce , etc., from the weather .
A poor cottage ; a small , mean house ; a hut .
In the manufacture of porcelain , a large , conical brick structure around which the firing kilns are grouped.
A Midwestern/Minnesotan slang term used to refer to straitjackets .

main_definition: An open shed for sheltering cattle , or protecting produce , etc., from the weather .
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) A poor cottage ; a small , mean house ; a hut .
In the manufacture of porcelain , a large , conical brick structure around which the firing kilns are grouped.
( slang ) ( archaic ) A Midwestern/Minnesotan slang term used to refer to straitjackets .
